title: Sponsor Hack4Change
subtitle: Become a founding sponsor of Moncton's inaugural civic tech hackathon. Your support enables exceptional participant experiences while addressing critical community challenges.
unitedWayNote: Hack4Change is organized in partnership with United Way, who serves as our fiscal sponsor managing all prize money and sponsor contributions. This ensures professional fund management and transparent financial stewardship, giving sponsors confidence their investment is handled by a registered charitable organization with established processes.

benefits.title: Talent Pipeline & Recruitment
items: Direct access to skilled developers, designers, and problem-solvers in action
Collect resumes and contact information from participants (with consent)
Send mentors who can evaluate talent while supporting teams
Conduct informal interviews and build relationships with emerging professionals

benefits.title: Technical Community Engagement
items: Your team mentors and evaluates cutting-edge solutions
Host workshops showcasing your technology or methodologies
Demonstrate thought leadership in civic technology
Connect with Moncton's growing tech community

benefits.title: Employer Branding
items: Show commitment to community impact and social innovation
Attract purpose-driven talent who value meaningful work
Stand out in a competitive talent market

benefits.title: Measurable Community Impact
items: Directly support technology solutions addressing homelessness
Your contribution funds a solution that will actually be built and deployed
Not just a weekend prototype, lasting community infrastructure

benefits.title: Corporate Social Responsibility
items: Perfect fit for CSR initiatives focused on housing, poverty, or innovation
Concrete, verifiable impact you can report to stakeholders
Partnership with respected community organizations (GMHSC, Civic Tech Moncton)

benefits.title: Brand Visibility & Recognition
items: Anticipated local and regional media coverage
Recognition at event with 20-40 participants, mentors, judges, and guests
Named in all ongoing communications about the deployed solution
Logo placement across website, social media, and event materials

local.title: For Local Businesses:
local.description: Bronze ($2,000) and Community Supporter ($500) tiers fit any budget. Show Moncton you care about solving real community challenges. Connect with local tech community and young professionals. Be part of something historic, Moncton's first civic tech hackathon.

differentiator.title: The Hack4Change Differentiator
differentiator.subtitle: Unlike typical hackathons, your sponsorship doesn't fund a weekend prototype that gets abandoned.
benefits: A solution that WILL be fully developed
Deployment to real organizations serving 500+ individuals
Measurable, lasting community impact
Open-source code benefiting communities beyond Moncton
differentiator.closing: Your brand gets associated with actual, lasting community infrastructure, not just a weekend event.

title.idealFor: Ideal for: Major corporations, banks, insurance companies, provincial Crown corporations
benefits: Event Naming Rights: "Hack4Change: Civic Tech Moncton Hackathon presented by [Your Company]"
5-minute keynote speaking opportunity at both opening and closing ceremonies
Exclusive booth with premier positioning at venue
Present winning team prizes on stage
Send 3+ mentors and technical experts
Logo on ALL materials with top-tier prominence
Post-event success story collaboration for your marketing materials
First right of refusal for Title Sponsor at 2027 event

gold.idealFor: Ideal for: Major regional companies, large technology firms, financial institutions
benefits: Premier logo placement (larger size, top positioning on all materials)
3-5 minute keynote speaking opportunity at opening ceremony
Send 2 mentors to support participants throughout the event
Host a custom workshop session (30-45 minutes)
Send judges to evaluate final project presentations
Featured prominently in press releases and media outreach

silver.idealFor: Ideal for: Mid-size companies, regional technology firms
benefits: Logo on all event materials (programs, signage, presentations)
1-2 minute speaking opportunity at opening ceremony
Send 1 mentor to support participants during event
Booth/table space at venue for recruitment and promotion
Access to participant contact information and resumes (with consent)

bronze.idealFor: Ideal for: Local IT companies, small businesses, community organizations
benefits: Logo on event website
Social media recognition (multiple posts across platforms)
Thank you mention at opening and closing ceremonies
Invitation to networking reception
Logo in digital event materials

community.idealFor: Perfect for: Startups, small businesses, sole proprietors who want to support civic innovation
benefits: Logo on event website
Social media recognition
Recognition as Community Supporter at event
Certificate of appreciation

meal.title: Meal Sponsorship
meal.description: Sponsor specific meals throughout the weekend with prominent recognition: "Saturday Breakfast powered by [Your Company]" or "Sunday Lunch presented by [Your Company]"

swag.title: Swag Sponsorship
swag.description: Provide branded items (t-shirts, water bottles, notebooks, stickers) distributed to all participants and volunteers. Your logo alongside Civic Tech Moncton branding on quality items participants will actually use.

custom.title: Custom Packages Available
custom.description: Have specific goals or a unique way you'd like to support? We're happy to create custom sponsorship packages. Contact us at contact@hack4change.ca.

steps.title: Schedule a Conversation
steps.description: Let's discuss how your organization can be part of this inaugural event.

steps.title: Confirm Your Sponsorship
steps.description: We'll provide a formal sponsorship agreement outlining benefits and deliverables. Upon signing, we'll begin promoting your involvement immediately.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.intro: Hack4Change brings together established organizations to ensure credibility, impact, and professional execution:

unitedWay.title: United Way — Fiscal Sponsor
unitedWay.description: Manages all sponsor contributions and prize distribution, ensuring transparent financial stewardship through their established processes as a registered charitable organization.

gmhsc.title: Greater Moncton Homelessness Steering Committee — Challenge Partner
gmhsc.description: Defines the community challenge and will implement the winning solution across their member organizations serving 511+ individuals experiencing homelessness in Greater Moncton.

venn.title: Venn Innovation — Venue Sponsor
venn.description: Provides event space and serves as the community hub where Civic Tech Moncton meets weekly.

civicTech.title: Civic Tech Moncton — Organizing Team
civicTech.description: Volunteer-driven organization coordinating the event and leading post-hackathon solution development.

currentSponsors.title: Our Sponsors
currentSponsors.description: Sponsor logos and recognition will be displayed here as partnerships are confirmed.
currentSponsors.cta: Ready to become a founding sponsor?
currentSponsors.meetingNote: We're happy to meet in person or by video call to discuss sponsorship opportunities.
